mapper.select: select * from subscription_policy order by no;
insert into subscription_policy(policy_title , standard , max_count , price ,visible ,url) values(#{policy_title}, #{standard}, #{max_count}, #{price} ,#{visible} ,'http://url-test');
select count(*) from license where policy_no = #{subscribeNo};

select sp.policy_title, sp.standard , o.no, o.policy_no , o.user_no , o.month_count , o.start_date , o.end_date , o.org_price , o.dc_price , o.total_price , o.reg_date, o.month_payment from order_list o, subscription_policy sp where o.policy_no = sp.no and user_no=#{no};
mapper.insert: insert into subscription_change( license_no, policy_no, month_count, start_date, end_date, status ) values(#{license_no}, #{policy_no},#{month_count}, TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(#{start_date}, ' 00:00:00'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(#{end_date}, ' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'W' );
